item.description:
This is an out-and-back style hike (may loop depending on conditions and temperament) where we'll hike about 4.5 hours max. I figure about 5 - 6 miles of hiking. Exact trail will depend on conditions. We'll hike mostly on the white blaze trail on the way out, which is the toughest and most interesting part with cliffs and peaks with views at times. It runs the spine of the giant (see map).

The hike would start from the trailhead off of the paved parking lot across from Quinnipiac University. The hike would be moderate to a bit higher difficulty with a fair amount of up/down on the trail and a respectable length.

Meet at the parking lot at 9 AM.

Wear boots as it WILL be muddy after the rains! Bring a quart of water and some trail food/lunch for energy. Good idea to have a daypack to stow water and snack.

Approximate location/directions via MapQuest for paved parking lot off Mt. Carmel Ave., Hamden, CT:
http://www.mapquest.c...

Trail Map at:
http://www.ct.gov/dep...

Rough indication of topography via Google Maps (click Terrain button, if needed):
http://maps.google.co...

More park information at:
http://www.ct.gov/dep...

The leader on this one in Kevin S (http://hiking.meetup.... ) so please direct questions to him. A carpool from Manchester, CT area at 8 AM could be arranged if those interested e-mail Kevin.

=== Legal Stuff ===
By clicking on "Yes" or "Maybe" for this event you agree, warrant, and covenant as follows:

In consideration for accepting this entry, I, the registrant, intending to be legally bound, hereby, for myself, my heirs, my executors and administrators, do waive and release any and all rights for damages I may have against any parties or persons connected with the Hartford Area Hiking meetup group for and related to the above listed event. I attest and verify that I am physically fit to participate in any portion of this above listed event. I grant Hartford Area Hiking permission to use any photographs, film or videotapes of this event for any purpose.
item.how_to_find_us: Dark blue Dodge Grandcaravan, CT plates. Meet at hike location.
